title: Cape Hatteras National Seashore: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Bring Cape Hatteras to your students. Review our lesson plans and curricula. All Curriculum Materials   LESSON PLAN    Teeth or No Teeth? How to Eat like a Whale Learn More     Field Trips Visiting the national seashore is a great way to bring your lessons to life! Learn more about the hands-on, interactive ranger programs available for your class and get planning information for your trip. All Field Trips   RANGER LED PROGRAM    Sea Turtles Program Learn More
